definitions.definition: A flash of light produced by short-duration, high-voltage discharge of electricity within a cloud, between clouds, or between a cloud and the earth.
definitions.example: Although we did not see the lightning, we did hear the thunder.
That tree was hit by lightning.

definitions.definition: The act of making bright, or the state of being made bright; enlightenment; brightening, as of the mental powers.
Extremely fast or sudden; moving (as if) at the speed of lightning.
